languages.text: {n}Джай нетерпеливо дергает ногой, звонко стуча каблуком о брусчатку.{/n} "Сначала этот лифт. Теперь Вольный Торговец запропастил{rt_mf|ся|ась} в местном архиве. Интуиция говорит мне, что из нас делают дураков, а мы, простаивая здесь, им подыгрываем..."

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай нетерпеливо дергает ногой, звонко стуча каблуком о брусчатку.{/n} "Сначала этот лифт. Теперь Вольный Торговец запропастил{rt_mf|ся|ась} в местном архиве. Интуиция говорит мне, что из нас делают дураков, а мы, простаивая здесь, им подыгрываем..."

Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

"And what will the esteemed lord say to me now?" {n}A smile sweeter than honey lights up Jae's face, but it quickly fades when the guard refuses to accept the heavy leather purse from her hands.{/n} "Damned ashmag, may azhi tear you apart for your thick-headed foolishness! Get out of my way!"

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

{n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

languages.text: {n}婕伊用脚不耐烦地点着地，脚跟重重地踩在人行道的石头上。{/n}“先是电梯出了问题，现在行商浪人又被困在了档案馆。我感觉他们在搞阴谋诡计。此时此刻，我们在这里傻等着，这正中了他们的下怀……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊用脚不耐烦地点着地，脚跟重重地踩在人行道的石头上。{/n}“先是电梯出了问题，现在行商浪人又被困在了档案馆。我感觉他们在搞阴谋诡计。此时此刻，我们在这里傻等着，这正中了他们的下怀……”

languages.text: {n}Jae mueve el pie con impaciencia, golpeando el pavimento con el talón.{/n} «Primero el ascensor y ahora {rt_mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está atrapad{rt_mf|o|a} en el archivo local. Mi instinto me dice que nos la están jugando, y que esperando aquí estamos cayendo en su trampa...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae mueve el pie con impaciencia, golpeando el pavimento con el talón.{/n} «Primero el ascensor y ahora {rt_mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está atrapad{rt_mf|o|a} en el archivo local. Mi instinto me dice que nos la están jugando, y que esperando aquí estamos cayendo en su trampa...».

languages.text: {n}Jae, sabırsızca ayağını sallıyor ve topuğunu kaldırım taşlarına vurarak gürültü çıkarıyor.{/n} "Önce asansörü kullanamadık, şimdi de Hür Tacir arşivde sıkıştı kaldı. İçgüdülerim bana bizimle dalga geçtiklerini söylüyor. Burada durup oyunlarına geliyoruz..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, sabırsızca ayağını sallıyor ve topuğunu kaldırım taşlarına vurarak gürültü çıkarıyor.{/n} "Önce asansörü kullanamadık, şimdi de Hür Tacir arşivde sıkıştı kaldı. İçgüdülerim bana bizimle dalga geçtiklerini söylüyor. Burada durup oyunlarına geliyoruz..."

languages.text: {n}ジェイは苛立たしげに足を動かし、かかとが敷石を大きな音で叩く。{/n}「さっきはエレベーター、今度は現地の記録保管室にローグトレーダーが閉じ込められてるって？直感だけど、アタシたちはまんまとバカにされてる気がするわ。ここで突っ立ってるのは、まさに相手の思うつぼよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは苛立たしげに足を動かし、かかとが敷石を大きな音で叩く。{/n}「さっきはエレベーター、今度は現地の記録保管室にローグトレーダーが閉じ込められてるって？直感だけど、アタシたちはまんまとバカにされてる気がするわ。ここで突っ立ってるのは、まさに相手の思うつぼよ…」

languages.text: {n}Jae agite un pied impatiemment et le bruit de son talon résonne sur les pavés.{/n} « D'abord l'ascenseur, et maintenant {rt_mf|le libre-marchand est coincé|la libre-marchande est coincée} dans les archives locales... Mon instinct me souffle qu'on se moque de nous, et qu'on se laisse faire en patientant sagement ici... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae agite un pied impatiemment et le bruit de son talon résonne sur les pavés.{/n} « D'abord l'ascenseur, et maintenant {mf|le libre-marchand est coincé|la libre-marchande est coincée} dans les archives locales... Mon instinct me souffle qu'on se moque de nous, et qu'on se laisse faire en patientant sagement ici... »

languages.text: {n}Jae klopft ungeduldig mit ihrem Fuß auf die Pflastersteine.{/n} "Erst dieser Aufzug und jetzt steckt {rt_mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} im hiesigen Archiv fest. Meine Intuition sagt mir, dass sie uns zum Narren halten und wir ihnen genau in die Karten spielen, indem wir hier unten herumstehen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae jerks her foot impatiently, her heel tapping loudly against the paving stones.{/n} "First that elevator, now the Rogue Trader is stuck in the local archive. Intuition tells me they are making fools of us, and we are playing right into their hands by standing around down here..."
